thread.title: Golden start for Narayana Vidyalayam's Tejas, Rashmi, Riya in CBSE West Zone Taekwondo
thread.title_full: Golden start for Narayana Vidyalayam's Tejas, Rashmi, Riya in CBSE West Zone Taekwondo - The Times of India

author: Suhas Nayse
title: Golden start for Narayana Vidyalayam's Tejas, Rashmi, Riya in CBSE West Zone Taekwondo
text:
NAGPUR: The opening day of the CBSE West Zone Taekwondo Championship turned out to be a golden day for the hosts Narayana Vidyalayam, Wardha Road. As many as three students of Narayana grabbed gold medals much to the jubilation of their home supporters.
Tejas Wankhede, Rashmi Nimbalkar and Riya Wankhede rose to the occasion on their home front to come up trumps in their respective events.
Talented Tejas bagged gold in the U-19 (below 55-kg weight category) by overcoming Adarsh Jain of Deepak Memorial Academy, Sagar 13-2.
Competing in the U-14 section, Rashmi thumped Akanksha Khandelwal of Bhavan's RK Vidya Mandir, Raipur in the below 20-kg final.
The below 25-kg weight category title clash saw Riya claiming gold medal with a dominating 10-0 victory over Lavanya Surdekar of DAV Panvel.
In the below 50-kg U-19 boys category final, Bhavik Lakwal of Coulmbia Convent, Indore downed Anil Rajak of Neiil World School, Morena 11-8.
Earlier, the meet was inaugurated by Nagpur University's director of sports Dhananjay Welukar, Indrajeet Basu, Sanman Singh, Col UK Chembath and Mala Chembath.
